attributes.short_description: Automated Software Deployment - Bug fix SCRUM-18
attributes.description: This change is to deploy a bug fix for SCRUM-18.
attributes.implementation_plan: Software update is tested and results can be found in Test Summaries Tab; When the change is approved the implementation happens automated by the CICD pipeline within the change planned start and end time window.
attributes.backout_plan: When software fails in production, the previous software release will be re-deployed.
attributes.test_plan: Testing if the software was successfully deployed
